description: Hormone Health, this course takes a comprehensive approach on hormone disruptors in the environment and how they affect our health. It's purpose is provide you with information on how you can improve your health through balancing your hormones. It goes through the major hormone disruptors in our environment and how we can improve hormone health. This course is truly ideal for anyone that wants to achieve optimal health and wellness throughout life since hormones are such an integral part of the healthy living. Clinically we are starting to see more and more hormone imbalances and this course will teach you what you can start doing today to improve your hormone balance throughout life.
title: Hormone Health
